name: FINDING (David Mills - Game Developer!)
description:
Abandoned in a strange and hostile world, you must journey to find your place. What horrific beast stalk the surrounding seas? And what abominations perch high above? Where in such a cold and dying world is there a place for one so vulnerable?



I made this game for the "AI and Games Jam 2022". The theme was "ISOLATION".

- Take part in an ethereal horror adventure!
- Overcome challenges unique to a strange world!
- Hide from otherworldly terrors -- or use BOMBS to blow them up!
- Balance on tightropes, sneak around monsters, paddle a boat and more!
- Gamepad and Keyboard/Mouse compatible!
